Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394010) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394010)
